sentences.sContent: I am sure the Dark Lord will not begrudge you the girl, Greyback, after what you have done tonight.
sentences.sContent_eng: I am sure the Dark Lord will not begrudge you the girl, Greyback, after what you have done tonight.
sentences.sCn: 格雷伯克，你今晚功劳这么大，我相信黑魔王不会舍不得给你这个女孩儿的。

synos.tran: 羡慕，嫉妒；吝惜，舍不得给

remMethod.val: be + grudge (不给予) → 舍不得给

trans.tranOther: to feel annoyed or unhappy that you have to pay something, give someone something etc
